recipesJson.name: TOC'S Creamy White Christmas Stuff
recipesJson.author: VapingCrimson
recipesJson.description: Vanilla pudding was the missing ingredient for the thickness in my eggnog!  Meringue and Eggnog for the delicious egg taste I wanted in this.  Whipped cream to blend things together.  Cookie to add a little hint of crumble cookie on the top and sweetness because I like my eggnog sweet.  Hope you enjoy.
